content: उपोढ {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Collected, accumulated, increased, stored up; उपोढतपसां <ls>Ś. 5. 7</ls>; °बलस्य ते <ls>M. 5. 1</ls>; <ls>V. 2. 7</ls>; so °मदः, °हर्षः &c. {@--2@} Brought near, proximate, near; <ls>Ki. 17. 54</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">13. 23.</ls> {@--3@} Arrayed for battle (as an army). {@--4@} Begun, commenced; उपोढशब्दा न रथांगनेमयः <ls>Ś. 7. 10</ls> causing sound. {@--5@} Married. {@--6@} A battle-array.
उपोढ {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Brought near. {@--2@} Advanced, begun.
